mapper.insert: insert into all_list (my_id, gmt_create, gmt_modify, id, count, content, type, name, key_code, is_deleted, status) values (#{myId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtModify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update all_list set gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, key_code = #{keyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where my_id = #{myId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select my_id, gmt_create, gmt_modify, id, count, content, type, name, key_code, is_deleted, status from all_list where my_id = #{myId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select my_id, gmt_create, gmt_modify, id, count, content, type, name, key_code, is_deleted, status from all_list
